text: Acalypha hontauyuensis is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is a shrub endemic to Orchid Island, Taiwan. The Flora of China, however, lists it as a synonym of Acalypha suirenbiensis from the Taiwanese mainland. ==Habitat and conservation== Acalypha hontauyuensis grows in dry scrub. It is locally abundant but vulnerable to habitat loss. ==References== hontauyuensis Category:Endemic flora of Taiwan Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Acalypha hontauyuensis
